trailingComments.value: Update relative Markdown links to take into account the new directory

leadingComments.value: Update relative Markdown links to take into account the new directory

trailingComments.value: Determine depth of Markdown file compared to subjects directory
(subjects/a/index.html has depth 1, subjects/a/b/index.html has depth 2, etc)

leadingComments.value: Determine depth of Markdown file compared to subjects directory
(subjects/a/index.html has depth 1, subjects/a/b/index.html has depth 2, etc)

trailingComments.value: Use the first Markdown header as the HTML <title>

leadingComments.value: Use the first Markdown header as the HTML <title>

trailingComments.value: Get remark options from main configuration file

leadingComments.value: Get remark options from main configuration file

trailingComments.value: Override remark options per slide deck with subjects/*/remark.js configuration file (if present)

leadingComments.value: Override remark options per slide deck with subjects/*/remark.js configuration file (if present)

trailingComments.value: Insert the Remark Markdown into our HTML template

leadingComments.value: Insert the Remark Markdown into our HTML template
